channel.title: project-writeup on S. Verona Lišková
channel.description: Recent content in project-writeup on S. Verona Lišková

item.title: Automating transaction imports with Actual
item.description: My fiancé, who is a CFP, recently encouraged me to finally set up a budget. I found Actual to be the most appropriate client for me; I love the nice design and the very responsive devteam. So far it’s a wonderful open-source project that I want to contribute to in the future. The killer feature Actual is currently missing is inbuilt transaction import. Apparently this is in development through Plaid integration, but I can’t find a timeline on this, and in order for me to be able to stick with a budget I need to not have to manually type in a payee, date, and amount every time I buy something.

item.title: Refurbishing an old Twitter bot
item.description: Some time ago Numberphile released a series of videos concerning sequences in the OEIS with pretty plots. Inspired, I wrote a little Twitter bot that tweets out two such plots each day. I even got a follow from 3Blue1Brown. It was a wonderful source of dopamine for a while. Because I hacked the thing together in a dayYou can check out the source code, if you’re okay with your eyes melting out of your skull.
